page.title: 01THE AREA AT A GLANCE
page.content: HARROW IS A RESIDENTIAL SUBURB, 13 MILES TO THE N.W OF LONDON. THE RELIEF IS MOSTLY FLAT BUT THE S.E. IS DOMINATED BY HARROW HILL,124M.MANY PEOPLE COMMUTE ON THE MET.LINE. LOCAL EMPLOYMENT IS IN OFFICES,SHOPS AND FACTORIES. SOME CENTRAL LONDON FIRMS ARE RELOCATING TO HARROW TO TAKE ADVANTAGE OF LOWER RENTS AND GOOD TRANSPORT FACILITIES. THE POPULATION HAS CHANGED SIGNIFICANTLY IN THE LAST 30 YEARS WITH THE ARRIVAL OF PEOPLE FROM S.ASIA,E.AFRICA,THE CARIBBEAN AND ELSEWHERE. THE TOWN CENTRE IS UNDERGOING RADICAL REDEVELOPMENT WITH SHOPS, OFFICES, CAR PARKS, A SHOPPING PRECINCT, BUS STATION AND BY_PASS. TRANSPORT:BUS:LONDON TRANSPORT. RAIL:METROPOLITAN LINE, B.R.(EUSTON). ROAD:EASY ACCESS M1,M4,M2,M40,A40,A41. EARLY CLOSING: WEDNESDAY.
